member.summary: Set and get string that identifies the X.25 address to connect to.

member.summary: Set and get string that specifies the facilities to request from the X.25 host at connection.

member.name: P:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.X25UserData

member.name: P:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.Channels
member.summary: Set and get number specifying the number of channels supported by the device.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.UseCountryAndAreaCodes
member.summary: If this flag is set, the CountryID, CountryCode, and AreaCode members are used to construct the phone number.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.SpecificIpAddr
member.summary: If this flag is set, RAS tries to use the IP address specified by IpAddr as the IP address for the dial-up connection.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.SpecificNameServers
member.summary: If this flag is set, RAS uses the IpAddrDns, IpAddrDnsAlt, IpAddrWins, and IpAddrWinsAlt members to specify the name server addresses for the dial-up connection.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.IpHeaderCompression
member.summary: If this flag is set, RAS negotiates to use IP header compression on PPP connections.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.RemoteDefaultGateway
member.summary: If this flag is set, the TCP/IP route table will be modified so that the default route of that RAS connection will be chosen in preference to the existing default routes.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.DisableLcpExtensions
member.summary: If this flag is set, RAS disables the PPP LCP extensions defined in RFC 1570.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.SwCompression
member.summary: If this flag is set, software compression is negotiated on the link.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.RequireEncryptedPw
member.summary: If this flag is set, only password schemes that provide enhanced security can be used to authenticate the client with the server.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.RequireMsEncryptedPw
member.summary: If this flag is set, only the Microsoft CHAP password scheme can be used to authenticate the client with the server.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.RequireDataEncryption
member.summary: If this flag is set, data encryption must be negotiated successfully or the connection should be dropped.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.NetworkLogon
member.summary: If this flag is set, RAS logs on to the network after the point-to-point connection is established.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.UseLogonCredentials
member.summary: If this flag is set, RAS uses the user name, password, and domain of the currently logged-on user when dialing this entry.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.PromoteAlternates
member.summary: This flag has an effect when alternate phone numbers are defined by the AlternateOffset member.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.DialAsLocalCall
member.summary: If this flag is set, RAS constructs the phone number as a local call, including the area code if it is different from the area code at the current location.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.ProhibitPAP
member.summary: If this flag is set to 1, the use of the Password Authentication Protocol (PAP) authentication method is disabled.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.ProhibitCHAP
member.summary: If this flag is set to 1, the use of the Challenge Handshake Authentication Protocol (CHAP) authentication method is disabled.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.ProhibitMsCHAP
member.summary: If this flag is set to 1, the use of the Microsoft Challenge Handshake Authentication Protocol (MSCHAP) authentication method is disabled.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.ProhibitMsCHAP2
member.summary: If this flag is set to 1, the use of the Microsoft Challenge Handshake Authentication Protocol version 2.0 (MSCHAPv2) authentication method is disabled.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.ProhibitEAP
member.summary: If this flag is set to 1, the use of the Extensible Authentication Protocol (EAP) authentication method is disabled.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.PreviewUserPw
member.summary: If this flag is set, RAS will display a username and password dialog box before dialing.

member.name: F:DNWA.BHTCL.RasEntry.EN_OPTIONS.CustomScript
member.summary: For Windows CE .NET 4.0 ,this flag must be set for RAS to invoke a custom-scripting DLL after establishing the connection to the server.
